name: docker-git
description: A docker container for hosting Git repos over SSH

scripts.docker:run: mkdir -p keys; mkdir -p hostkeys; mkdir -p repo; docker run -e DEBUG=docker-git -v "`pwd`/hostkeys:/git/hostkeys/etc/ssh:rw" -v "`pwd`/keys:/git/keys:rw" -v "`pwd`/repo:/git/repo:rw" -p 22:22 -p 8002:8002 thejimmyg/docker-git:0.1.0
scripts.docker:run:local: docker-compose stop && docker-compose pull && docker-compose up --build -d

author: James Gardner
